trigger.match: ^(?:You cannot see that being here|Nothing can be seen here by that name|You detect nothing here by that name|I do not recognize anything called that here|Ahh\, I am truly sorry\, but I do not see anyone by that name here)\.$
trigger.name: enemy_notarget__

trigger.match: ^A ghostly form rises from ([A-Z][a-z]+|.*?@target.*?)\'s body followed by a bright flash\. A new breathing body appears around the form\, restoring [hH](?:im|er) from certain death\.$
trigger.name: enemy_vitaed__

trigger.match: ^The body of (.*?@target.*?) shimmers briefly and returns to life\.$
trigger.name: enemy_resurrected__

trigger.match: ^A homunculus resembling a deformed \w+ gasps suddenly and then falls to the ground\, shrieking\, screaming\,? and writhing as [hH](?:is|er) body begins to expand\, [hH](?:is|er) arms\, legs\,? and torso growing\, thickening\, [hH](?:is|er) facial structure readjusting\, reforming\. A homunculus resembling a deformed \w+ suddenly ceases movement for a moment before standing\, having transformed into ([A-Z][a-z]+)\.$
trigger.name: enemy_homunculus_rezz__

trigger.match: ^The eyes of .+? swirl about in a kaleidoscopic array of swirling colours\, which turn to gaze directly at ([A-Z][a-z]+)\.\n\1 stares blankly into space\, [hH](?:is|er) eyes flashing with (.+?) spots\.$
trigger.name: enemy_hypnoticgazed__

trigger.match: ^([A-Z][a-z]+|.*?@target_name.*?) (?:(?:mutters and )?traces a cobalt blue pentagram in the air that remains hovering before [hH](?:im|er)|sprinkles a circle of salt around [hH](?:im|er)self\, and a shimmering white orb springs up around [hH](?:im|er)|is suddenly surrounded by cobalt blue sparks)\.$
trigger.name: enemy_shield__

trigger.match: ^[A-Z][a-z]+ sprinkles a circle of salt around ([A-Z][a-z]+)\, and a shimmering white orb springs up around [hH](?:im|er)\.$
trigger.name: enemy_shield_salted__

trigger.match: ^Spreading [hH](?:is|er) arms wide\, ([A-Z][a-z]+|.*?@target_name.*?) spins clockwise and a shimmering white orb springs up around [hH](?:im|er)\.$
trigger.name: enemy_shield_lowmagic__

trigger.match: ^A dizzying beam of energy strikes you as your attack rebounds off of ([A-Z][a-z]+|.*?@target_name.*?)\'s shield\.$
trigger.name: enemy_shield_hit__

trigger.match: ^Eyes glowing red\, (.*?@target_name.*?) bellows and a shield of protection flickers into view around [hH](?:is|er) form\.$
trigger.name: enemy_shield_target__

trigger.match: ^A spinning diamond around ([A-Z][a-z]+) weaves a glittering shield around [hH](?:im|er)\.$
trigger.name: enemy_shield_diamond__

trigger.match: ^A soft moan rises up from the ground as a shadowy bubble forms around ([A-Z][a-z]+)\.$
trigger.name: enemy_shield_wyrd__

trigger.match: Invisible energies slam against ([A-Z][a-z]+)\, ripping apart [hH](?:is|er) magical shield of protection\.$
trigger.name: enemy_unshield_highmagic__

trigger.match: ^(?:[A-Z][a-z]+ makes|You make) a sudden gesture at ([A-Z][a-z]+) and a bolt of black energy shoots out from (?:[hH](?:is|er)|your) outward stretched palm and shatters (?:[A-Z][a-z]+\'s|[hH](?:is|er)) magical shield of protection\.$
trigger.name: enemy_unshield_lowmagic__

trigger.match: ^.+? rushes towards (.*?@target_name.*?)\, breaking the protective shield around h(?:im|er)\.$
trigger.name: enemy_unshield_beast__

trigger.match: ^(?:[A-Z][a-z]+ plays a silent note on .+? and|Your blank\-note dissipates) ([A-Z][a-z]+|.*?@target_name.*?)\'s (?:magical shield dissipates into nothingness|shield)\.$
trigger.name: enemy_unshield_blanknote__

trigger.match: ^Eyes flashing with anger\, ([A-Z][a-z]+) points a finger imperiously at ([A-Z][a-z]+) and utters a series of guttural croaks\. You watch in amazement as warts break out over \2\'s skin\,? which then turns green and slimy\. Finally\, (?:[hH]|[sS]h)e shrinks and transforms into a large\, ugly toad\!$
trigger.name: enemy_toaded__

trigger.match: ^([A-Z][a-z]+) stomps down hard on a warty toad\.$
trigger.name: enemy_toad_stomping__

trigger.match: ^In order to put the pathetic life of a warty toad out of its misery\, you lift a foot and bring it down mightily on its bloated green body(?:\, but it manages to leap aside)?\.\n(.+?)
trigger.name: enemy_toad_stomped__

trigger.match: ^You suddenly perceive the vague outline of an aura of rebounding around ([A-Z][a-z]+)\.$
trigger.name: enemy_aura_appears__

trigger.match: \, but your \w+ hits [hH](?:is|er) powerful aura and rebounds back into you\.
trigger.name: enemy_aura_whacked__

trigger.match: ^([A-Z][a-z]+)\'s aura of weapons rebounding disappears\.$
trigger.name: enemy_aura_disappears__

trigger.match: ^With a focused look\, ([A-Z][a-z]+) \w+ at ([A-Z][a-z]+) with .+?\, but [hH](?:is|er) swing hits a powerful aura and rebounds back\.
trigger.name: enemy_aura_strike__

trigger.match: ^With a heavy overhand stroke\, ([A-Z][a-z]+) \w+ .+? down upon ([A-Z][a-z]+)\, but [hH](?:is|er) swing hits a powerful aura and rebounds back\.
trigger.name: enemy_aura_swingdown__

trigger.match: ^Letting .+? droop\, ([A-Z][a-z]+) suddenly heaves it up at ([A-Z][a-z]+)\, but [hH](?:is|er) swing hits a powerful aura and rebounds back\.
trigger.name: enemy_aura_swingup__

trigger.match: ^(?:[A-Z][a-z]+ razes|You raze) ([A-Z][a-z]+|.*?@target_name.*?)\'s (aura of rebounding|magical shield|speed defence) with .+?\.$
trigger.name: enemy_shieldaura_razed__

trigger.match: ^(?:[A-Z][a-z]+ whips|You whip) .+? through the air in front of ([A-Z][a-z]+|.*?@target_name.*?)\, to no effect\.$
trigger.name: enemy_shieldaura_norazing__

trigger.match: ^An enormous wave sweeps over ([A-Z][a-z]+)\, knocking [hH](?:im|er) to the ground\.$
trigger.name: enemy_prone_waves__

trigger.match: ^([A-Z][a-z]+)(?: slips and falls in the puddle of puke| leaps up in what is apparently an attempt at a graceful swan dive\. (?:H|Sh)e smacks headfirst into the ground| suddenly cries out and falls on [hH](?:is|er) face|\'s legs collapse under [hH](?:im|er) as (?:[hH]|[sS]h)e suddenly passes out| kneels onto one knee\, demonstrating [hH](?:is|er) humility and respect| stumbles over [hH](?:is|er) feet as (?:[hH]|[sS]h)e tries to dance|suddenly clutches at [hH](?:is|er) head\, uttering a low\, insensate groan)\.$
trigger.name: enemy_prone_namefirst__

trigger.match: (?:breaks|crushes|pulveri[sz]es|smashes) the (?:left|right) (?:arm|leg) of ([A-Z][a-z]+)\.$
trigger.name: enemy_prone_namelast__

trigger.match: With an elegant stroke\, you \w+ [hH](?:is|er) (?:left|right) leg\, knocking [hH](?:im|er) to the ground\.$
trigger.name: enemy_prone_target__

trigger.match: ^The shofa hooks ([A-Z][a-z]+)\'s (?:left|right) leg\, sending [hH](?:im|er) tumbling\.$
trigger.name: enemy_prone_shofa__

trigger.match: at ([A-Z][a-z]+) with .+? With an elegant stroke\, [A-Z][a-z]+ \w+ [hH](?:is|er) (?:left|right) leg\, knocking [hH](?:im|er) to the ground\.$
trigger.name: enemy_prone_knockdown__

trigger.match: makes a slow\,? deadly strike at ([A-Z][a-z]+)\'s (?:left|right) leg with .+? With an elegant stroke\, [A-Z][a-z]+ \w+ [hH](?:is|er) (?:left|right) leg\, knocking [hH](?:im|er) to the ground\.$
trigger.name: enemy_prone_knockdown_cleave__

trigger.match: at ([A-Z][a-z]+)\'s (?:left|right) leg.*? [A-Z][a-z]+ \w+ the tendon above [hH](?:is|er) (?:left|right) heel\, making [hH](?:im|er) scream as it\'s completely severed\.$
trigger.name: enemy_prone_tendon__

trigger.match: ^The chain catches ([A-Z][a-z]+)\'s ankle, knocking [hH](?:im|er) prone\.$
trigger.name: enemy_prone_chain__

trigger.match: ^A pigwidgeon(?: bound in shadows)? maniacally runs in circles between the legs of ([A-Z][a-z]+)\, causing [hH](?:im|er) to trip\.$
trigger.name: enemy_prone_pigwidgeon__

trigger.match: ^A copious amount of blood suddenly splutters from ([A-Z][a-z]+)\'s gut onto the ground\, and (?:[hH]|[sS]h)e slips in the deep red puddle\.$
trigger.name: enemy_prone_bloodslip__

trigger.match: ^Thunder roars and a bolt of lightning strikes ([A-Z][a-z]+)\, knocking [hH](?:im|er) to the ground\.$
trigger.name: enemy_prone_lightning__

trigger.match: ^Streaks of energy race up from the crystalline ground and into ([A-Z][a-z]+)\, who crumples uselessly\.$
trigger.name: enemy_prone_crystals__

trigger.match: \. You \w+ the tendon above [hH](?:is|er) (?:left|right) heel\, making [hH](?:im|er) scream as it\'s completely severed\.$
trigger.name: enemy_prone_mytendon__

trigger.match: ^(?:[A-Z][a-z]+ squeezes [hH](?:is|er)|You squeeze your) legs around .+?\'s body and .+? immediately responds by thrusting out a hind leg and kicking ([A-Z][a-z]+) brutally in the chest\, knocking [hH](?:im|er) to the ground\.$
trigger.name: enemy_prone_beastkick__

trigger.match: ^([A-Z][a-z]+) deftly manages to remain standing\.$
trigger.name: enemy_unprone_acrobat__

trigger.match: ^([A-Z][a-z]+) stands up and stretches [hH](?:is|er) arms out wide\.$
trigger.name: enemy_unprone_stood__

trigger.match: ^In a swift\, fluid motion\, ([A-Z][a-z]+) springs up from [hH](?:is|er) hands to land crouched on [hH](?:is|er) feet\.$
trigger.name: enemy_unprone_sprungup__

trigger.match: ^([A-Z][a-z]+)(?: closes [hH](?:is|er) eyes\, curls up into a ball and|\'s eyes close suddenly as (?:[hH]|[sS]h)e) falls asleep\.$
trigger.name: enemy_asleep__

trigger.match: ^([A-Z][a-z]+) (?:opens [hH](?:is|er) eyes and yawns mightily|wakes up with a gasp of pain|awakens with a start)\.$
trigger.name: enemy_awake__

trigger.match: ^\(.+?\)\: [A-Z][a-z]+ says\, \"([A-Z][a-z]+) has fallen into a pit by me\: .+? \((\d+)\)\"
trigger.name: enemy_pitted_announced__

trigger.match: ^The ground suddenly falls away from beneath ([A-Z][a-z]+)\,? and (?:[sS]h|[hH])e goes tumbling into a pit\.
trigger.name: enemy_pitted__

trigger.match: ^Grasping at its edge\, ([A-Z][a-z]+) emerges from the pit\.$
trigger.name: enemy_climbed_rocks__

trigger.match: ^([A-Z][a-z]+) slowly climbs out of the pit\.$
trigger.name: enemy_climbed_out__

trigger.match: ^([A-Z][a-z]+)(?: disappears over the top of the pile of rubble to the|\'s footsteps are uncannily amplified as (?:[hH]|[sS]h)e leaves to the| is suddenly caught in the powerful currents of the whirling waters and is pulled out to the) (\w+)\.$
trigger.name: enemy_name_dir_out__

trigger.match: ^([A-Z][a-z]+)(?:\, riding .+?\,)? leaves to the (\w+)(?:\, emanating an aura of immense power)?\.$
trigger.name: enemy_walked_out__

trigger.match: ^([A-Z][a-z]+) is hurled out of the room to the (\w+) by the gust of wind\.$
trigger.name: enemy_gusted_away__

trigger.match: ^([A-Z][a-z]+)(?: clambers down from the pile of rubble to the|\'s footsteps are uncannily amplified as (?:[hH]|[sS]h)e enters from the| is blown in head over heels from the| is thrown in from the) (\w+)\.$
trigger.name: enemy_name_dir_in__

trigger.match: ^([A-Z][a-z]+)(?:\, riding .+?\,)? (?:enters|arrives) from the (\w+)(?:\, emanating an aura of immense power)?\.$
trigger.name: enemy_walked_in__

trigger.match: ^Arco\, the Hound of Papaxi yelps cheerfully and runs a wobbly circle around ([A-Z][a-z]+)\. With each pass they appear to become unfocused\, their forms blurring before fading entirely from view\.$
trigger.name: enemy_arco_out__

trigger.match: ^([A-Z][a-z]+) comes barreling in from the (\w+)\.$
trigger.name: enemy_barreled_in__

trigger.match: ^([A-Z][a-z]+) barges ([A-Z][a-z]+) to the (\w+)\.$
trigger.name: enemy_barreling__

trigger.match: ^([A-Z][a-z]+) wanders away\, beckoned by an unseen power\.$
trigger.name: enemy_beckoned_out__

trigger.match: ^([A-Z][a-z]+) glances briefly (\w+)wards and dashes off into the distance\.$
trigger.name: enemy_bolted__

trigger.match: ^[A-Z][a-z]+ powerfully bullkicks [A-Z][a-z]+\'s chest\, impacting with a sickening crunch\.$
trigger.name: enemy_bullkick__

trigger.match: ^([A-Z][a-z]+) sails out to the (\w+)\, flailing wildly\.$
trigger.name: enemy_bullkicked_out__

trigger.match: ^([A-Z][a-z]+) digs furiously at the ground and has soon burrowed out of sight\.$
trigger.name: enemy_burrowed__

trigger.match: ^You have slain ([A-Z][a-z]+|.*?@target.*?)\.$
trigger.name: enemy_dead__

trigger.match: ^([A-Z][a-z]+|.*?@target.*?) has been slain by
trigger.name: enemy_dead_other__

trigger.match: ^A warty toad has been slain by .+?\nShaking [hH](?:is|er) head\, ([A-Z][a-z]+) stands before you where once there was a toad\, looking slightly disoriented and perplexed with [hH](?:is|er) tongue lolling out the side of [hH](?:is|er) mouth\.$
trigger.name: enemy_dead_toad__

trigger.match: ^([A-Z][a-z]+) leaves to the archives to compose some text\.$
trigger.name: enemy_editor__

trigger.match: ^A large\, rectangular gateway opens up near you and as you hear the laughing voice of ([A-Z][a-z]+)\, ([A-Z][a-z]+) is drawn through\.$
trigger.name: enemy_empressed_out__

trigger.match: ^([A-Z][a-z]+)(?:\, riding .+?\,)? rushes away with a startling cry\.$
trigger.name: enemy_feared_out__

trigger.match: ^([A-Z][a-z]+) begins to flap [hH](?:is|er) wings powerfully\, and rises quickly up into the firmament\.$
trigger.name: enemy_flying1__

trigger.match: ^Leathery\, bat\-like wings stretch out behind ([A-Z][a-z]+)\, and (?:[sS]he|[hH]e) hurls [hH](?:im|er)self into the skies above\.$
trigger.name: enemy_flying2__

trigger.match: ^A pair of faerie wings rapidly flutters on ([A-Z][a-z]+)\'s back\, then carries [hH](?:im|er) up into the skies\.$
trigger.name: enemy_flying3__

trigger.match: ^([A-Z][a-z]+) spreads [hH](?:is|er) glorious golden wings and launches [hH](?:im|er)self into the skies above\.$
trigger.name: enemy_flying4__

trigger.match: ^With a sudden jolt\, ([A-Z][a-z]+) soars upwards riding a wiccan broom\.$
trigger.name: enemy_flying5__

trigger.match: ^The geyser strikes ([A-Z][a-z]+) full\-on\, and (?:[sS]h|[hH])e tumbles to the ground helplessly\.$
trigger.name: enemy_geyser__

trigger.match: ^Chanting hoarsely\, ([A-Z][a-z]+) is suddenly engulfed in a blaze of dark fire\, rising up from the ashes as a ghost\.$
trigger.name: enemy_ghost__

trigger.match: ^([A-Z][a-z]+) glances briefly (\w+)wards and glides off into the distance\.$
trigger.name: enemy_glide_out__

trigger.match: ^([A-Z][a-z]+) stumbles slowly (\w+)\, as if held back by some invisible force\.$
trigger.name: enemy_gravity_out__

trigger.match: ^([A-Z][a-z]+) is hurled to the (\w+) by the strength of the blow\.$
trigger.name: enemy_headbutt_out__

trigger.match: ^([A-Z][a-z]+) slowly hobbles (\w+)\.$
trigger.name: enemy_hobbled_out__

trigger.match: ^([A-Z][a-z]+) runs and then leaps gracefully to the (\w+)\.$
trigger.name: enemy_jumpkick_out__

trigger.match: ^([A-Z][a-z]+) leaps majestically to the (\w+)\.$
trigger.name: enemy_leaped_out__

trigger.match: ^([A-Z][a-z]+) has left the area\.$
trigger.name: enemy_left_area__

trigger.match: ^([A-Z][a-z]+) rises up in the air and is whisked off to the (\w+)\.$
trigger.name: enemy_mantrawind_out__

trigger.match: ^Suddenly\, the dark shadows seeps? into the ground\, taking ([A-Z][a-z]+) along with them\.$
trigger.name: enemy_moonbeam_out__

trigger.match: ^([A-Z][a-z]+)\, riding .+?\, gathers the reins and jumps off to the (\w+)\.$
trigger.name: enemy_mountjumped_out__

trigger.match: ^([A-Z][a-z]+) enters the Lusternia news system\.$
trigger.name: enemy_news_out__

trigger.match: ^([A-Z][a-z]+) is propelled to the (\w+) upon a pogo stick\.$
trigger.name: enemy_pogo_out__

trigger.match: ^([A-Z][a-z]+) polevaults out to the (\w+)\.$
trigger.name: enemy_polevault_out__

trigger.match: ^([A-Z][a-z]+) begins to roll towards the (\w+)\.$
trigger.name: enemy_rolling__

trigger.match: ^([A-Z][a-z]+)\'s roll takes [hH](?:im|er) out of the room to the (\w+)\.$
trigger.name: enemy_rolled_out__

trigger.match: ^[A-Z][a-z]+ leaps up into the air and twists around in a scissor kick\, slamming powerfully into [hH](?:is|er) foes\.$
trigger.name: enemy_scissorflip__

trigger.match: ^([A-Z][a-z]+) is thrown out to the (\w+)\.$
trigger.name: enemy_scissorflipped_out__

trigger.match: ^Shadows flock to ([A-Z][a-z]+) in a murky swirl\, swathing ([hH](?:im|er)) with darkness\. Suddenly\, the darkness seeps into the ground\, taking \2 along\.$
trigger.name: enemy_shadowflight__

trigger.match: ^([A-Z][a-z]+) disappears in a blur of motion\.$
trigger.name: enemy_starleap_out__

trigger.match: ^([A-Z][a-z]+) swims smoothly to the (\w+)\.$
trigger.name: enemy_swam_out__

trigger.match: ^([A-Z][a-z]+) tackles the legs of ([A-Z][a-z]+) and attempts to carry [hH](?:im|er) off to the (\w+)\.\n(?:H|Sh)e succeeds and carries \2 away\.$
trigger.name: enemy_tackled_away__

trigger.match: ^([A-Z][a-z]+) turns translucent and then vanishes\, leaving behind a cloud of sparkling motes of light\.$
trigger.name: enemy_teleport_out__

trigger.match: ^([A-Z][a-z]+) is picked up by the twister and thrown up into the sky\.$
trigger.name: enemy_tornadoed__

trigger.match: ^([A-Z][a-z]+) (?:is suddenly rocked by a strong gust of wind\, and falls head first to the ground|is blown\, flailing\, out of the tree)\.$
trigger.name: enemy_treefall1__

trigger.match: ^The bough that ([A-Z][a-z]+) is standing on suddenly tilts and branches forcibly hurl him out of the tree\, sending him tumbling to the forest floor\.$
trigger.name: enemy_treefall2__

trigger.match: ^You give ([A-Z][a-z]+) a vicious shove and watch in satisfaction as (?:[sS]h|[hH])e suffers a horrible fall\.$
trigger.name: enemy_treefall3__

trigger.match: ^[A-Z][a-z]+ gives a vicious shove to ([A-Z][a-z]+), who falls backwards through the tree branches\.$
trigger.name: enemy_treefall4__

trigger.match: ^Branches swoop down and lift ([A-Z][a-z]+) up into the trees\.$
trigger.name: enemy_treelift__

trigger.match: ^Animated branches from the trees above suddenly reach down and clutch ([A-Z][a-z]+)(?:\, riding .+?\,)? around the waist\, pulling [hH](?:im|er) into their foliage\.$
trigger.name: enemy_trees1__

trigger.match: ^([A-Z][a-z]+) reaches up and grabs a sturdy branch\, then pulls [hH](?:im|er)self up and disappears into the treetops\.$
trigger.name: enemy_trees2__

trigger.match: ^([A-Z][a-z]+) gracefully swings down out of the trees\.$
trigger.name: enemy_trees_climb_down__

trigger.match: ^([A-Z][a-z]+) begins to tumble towards the (\w+)\.$
trigger.name: enemy_tumbling__

trigger.match: ^([A-Z][a-z]+) tumbles out to the (\w+)\.$
trigger.name: enemy_tumbled_out__

trigger.match: ^([A-Z][a-z]+) makes an elegant gesture with the back of [hH](?:is|er) hand\, and a whirlwind swiftly rises up\.$
trigger.name: enemy_whirlwind__

trigger.match: ^The whirlwind sweeps ([A-Z][a-z]+) off [hH](?:is|er) feet and blows [hH](?:im|er) to the (\w+)\.$
trigger.name: enemy_whirlwinded_out__

trigger.match: ^([A-Z][a-z]+) suddenly rushes away at an impossible speed\, [hH](?:is|er) figure becoming a blur of motion\.$
trigger.name: enemy_willowisp_out__

trigger.match: ^([A-Z][a-z]+) tumbles in from the (\w+)\.$
trigger.name: enemy_tumbled_in__

trigger.match: ^([A-Z][a-z]+) prepares to somersault to the (\w+)\.$
trigger.name: enemy_somersaulting__

trigger.match: ^([A-Z][a-z]+) jumps up and tucks [hH](?:im|er)self into a somersault\, diving past obstructions to the (\w+)\.$
trigger.name: enemy_somersaulted_out__

trigger.match: ^([A-Z][a-z]+) flips in from the (\w+) in a spectacular somersault\.$
trigger.name: enemy_somersaulted_in__

trigger.match: ^([A-Z][a-z]+) frowns in concentration\, [hH](?:is|er) facial expression changing into one akin to longing\.$
trigger.name: enemy_bond_uniting__

trigger.match: ^([A-Z][a-z]+) suddenly appears extremely uncomfortable\, and you just have time to see [hH](?:is|er) expression relax again as (?:[hH]|[sS]h)e disappears in a rush of air\.$
trigger.name: enemy_bond_united_out__

trigger.match: ^A rush of air accompanies the entrance of ([A-Z][a-z]+) as (?:[hH]|[sS]h)e appears next to .+?\, appearing strangely grateful\.$
trigger.name: enemy_bond_united_in__

trigger.match: ^([A-Z][a-z]+) begins to slowly clamber over the rubble that blocks [hH](?:is|er) way\.$
trigger.name: enemy_rubble__

trigger.match: ^A hauntingly beautiful song fills the air\, and a small smile breaks out on ([A-Z][a-z]+)\'s face as [hH](?:is|er) eyes glaze over\.$
trigger.name: enemy_summon_song__

trigger.match: ^As the song reaches a crescendo\, ([A-Z][a-z]+) wanders in with eyes glazed over\.$
trigger.name: enemy_summon_song_out__

trigger.match: ^([A-Z][a-z]+) wanders away\, following the haunting song\.$
trigger.name: enemy_summon_song_in__

trigger.match: ^Delicate cherry blossom petals burst into a joyous flurry and envelop ([A-Z][a-z]+)(?:\, riding .+?\,)? before swirling away to the (\w+)\.$
trigger.name: enemy_demipower_gone1__

trigger.match: ^([A-Z][a-z]+)(?:\, riding .+?\,)? explodes in a cloud of shimmering\, golden pollen\, which fades as the vibrant blossoms on the ground continue (\w+)ward\.$
trigger.name: enemy_demipower_gone2__

trigger.match: ^([A-Z][a-z]+)(?:\, riding .+?\,)? fades away as the wind picks up\, carried (\w+)ward by the raging gale until (?:[hH]|[sS]h)e has completely vanished\.$
trigger.name: enemy_demipower_gone3__

trigger.match: ^A panoply of swirling\, multicoloured lights twist about and envelop ([A-Z][a-z]+)(?:\, riding .+?\,)? before lancing off to the (\w+)\.$
trigger.name: enemy_demipower_gone4__

trigger.match: ^With a playful wink\, ([A-Z][a-z]+)(?:\, riding .+?\,)? explodes into a shower of iridescent bubbles that flows? off to the (\w+) in a wave of shimmering colours\.$
trigger.name: enemy_demipower_gone5__

trigger.match: ^([A-Z][a-z]+)(?:\, riding .+?\,)? fades away as (?:[hH]|[sS]h)e exhales a cloud of swirling\, rainbow\-hued smoke that drifts off to the (\w+)\.$
trigger.name: enemy_demipower_gone6__

trigger.match: ^([A-Z][a-z]+)(?:\, riding .+?\,)? strides out to the (\w+)\, preceded by an array of complex fractals\.$
trigger.name: enemy_demipower_gone7__

trigger.match: ^The crystalline orb surrounding ([A-Z][a-z]+)(?:\, riding .+?\,)? suddenly contracts in a flash of light before drifting off to the (\w+)\.$
trigger.name: enemy_demipower_gone8__
